intro: Dichromena ciliata var. cinnamomea, commonly known as the cinnamon leaf plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, including countries such as Kenya and Tanzania. It produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in terminal inflorescences. This variety is often cultivated for its ornamental value and aromatic foliage.
